caption.title: Predictions of the regression model.
caption.p: Observed versus simulated NDVI value for farmland (R 2 = 0.81). The grey dots indicate actual observations, the red dots indicate simulated data from 1984 to 2003, and the blue dots indicate cross validation for 2004â€“2014. The predictions are one-step ahead predictions, meaning that the data points at time t provide the input for the predictions at time t + 1 (see Eq. 11). The model predictions use the same time interval of 1 month as the time series data.
Click here for additional data file.
